metadata.title: CVE-2016-10937 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
IMAPFilter through 2.6.12 does not validate the hostname in an SSLcertificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10937` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imapfilter - 1:2.5.2-2+deb8u1build0.14.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: imapfilter package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.5.2-2+deb8u1build0.14.04.1~esm1').
